/*!
 * Buttons helper for fancyBox
 * version: 1.0.3
 * @requires fancyBox v2.0 or later
 *
 * Usage:
 *     $(".fancybox").fancybox({
 *         helpers : {
 *             buttons: {
 *                 position : 'top'
 *             }
 *         }
 *     });
 *
 * Options:
 *     tpl - HTML template
 *     position - 'top' or 'bottom'
 *
 */
